attributes.action: halt the recommended closure of Capel Dewi School, nr Llandysul, Ceredigion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ceredigion Education Authority are recommending closure of this 95 year old school based on viability.  We believe parents should be allowed the choice of sending their children to a small school - one which has an excellent reputation. The Capel Dewi community feel that the school was presented with a ‘done deal’, with no alternatives, no options and no opportunities for real dialogue or discussion about the impact of the closure, after 95 years, on the sustainability of a small village community.  Please add your voice to halt the closure and keep our school open.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Welsh Assembly.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
